website_summaries.verdict: Great for those times when convenience is king. All this basket asks of you is that you fill it up and grab a companion.
pros: Barring the food, this option includes everything you need right down to the blanket
Affordable and attractive with a woven wicker construction and faux leather straps
cons: Although sturdy, the durability of the straps is questionable
Some feel it's a bit too small with the blanket packed inside

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: I loved this picnic basket! It was so so cute and perfectly sized. But... I used it ONCE and the handle broke off. I'm so disappointed; I would have expected better from this.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Indoors or Outdoors - Who doesn't want to have a picnic?
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality - comes with so many things including a really nice blanket. I love the leather detailing - 1st class. I purchased two of these baskets as a gift for my two sons who recently became engaged. I added a bottle of wine with a custom label made from Etsy with their names and the date of their engagement. Many of the guests were commenting on how nice the basket was. No need to wrap it - just add the card to the top. I highly recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Picnic Basket!!
customer_reviews.text: This a great little basket! The description say's it's a picnic basket for two and keep that in mind. Well built, finished with decent to good detail. Includes the plates, utensils, cloth napkins, and the plastic wine glasses. Used it for the first time over this past weekend for my wife and I; and with a bottle of wine in the basket, space starts to get tight... so definitely a picnic basket for two only. I packed a bottle of wine, cheese/fruit/nuts flight (small tray 7x7"), and four small (4x3x3" ) small plastic containers and the basket was basically as full as it could get. Considering it is only $44, I am pleased with the quality, size, and value.
customer_reviews.author: NC Scott

customer_reviews.title: Leave fried chicken at home or put it in another bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for 2 people. However it will not carry very much food. Even on the light snack side of things. In other works if your planning lunch, the fried chicken and sides wont fit! A couple of sandwiches, bag of chips and fruit..your good to go! Also, pretty disappointed that this one is only $5 cheaper than the one for 4ppl (see my review on that one as well).
customer_reviews.author: BrianW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sturdy basket
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and it appears to be beautiful. The inside doesnt seem big enough for the wine bottles people are posting inside... but i can definitely pack cheese crackers grapes and seafood for 4 in it.
customer_reviews.author: Epiphanyt Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect unique wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived unbroken and in good condition. I unwrapped it all and placed in proper holders added a blanket to the inside and It made the perfect wedding gift. Basket is on the smaller side and light weight the straps do seem a little on the cheeped side but nothing that can’t be easily replaced in time. Overall pretty happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Love yet disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love the basket and am so excited to take it on a picnic with my husband. However, I was disappointed as it advertised that it came with a waterproof blanket, which was not included. I called amazon and they said my only option would be to return the basket, however they no longer have the one I want in stock. I don’t want to return the basket, so I just took the loss. The basket looks way more expensive than it is!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived mostly intact. However, one of the leather straps meant to keep a wine glass in place came with a broken pin. Overall, the basket set looks nice, and for all it includes it's a decent price. I won't be returning it or anything, but of course I wish it hadn't come already damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Keanan

customer_reviews.title: A Marvel of Planned Obsolescence
customer_reviews.text: Only two stars, and for two reasons. First, if you plan to pack all the items that come with the basket, you are left with very little room for food or drink - you will need a second cooler or carryall for that. Second, the handle strap tore away on its third use, and the construction is such that it proved too difficult to repair. BE ADVISED: the return window is only 30 days. So at this time, this marvel of planned obsolescence sits unused in my laundry closet, alongside the Windex.
customer_reviews.author: versusvoxest

customer_reviews.title: The basket came quickly and is adorable. The quality seems good and everything was there ...
customer_reviews.text: For years I have wanted to have a "real" picnic basket so finally bit the bullet and ordered mine from Amazon. The basket came quickly and is adorable. The quality seems good and everything was there as promised. I am going out today for a picnic in Albuquerque and will be taking my basket!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality. I got it for a shower gift ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very good quality. I got it for a shower gift and thank goodness opened it up first. Crooked peice of fabric, looked very cheap. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: Had the cutest picnic with my gf. Comes with a nice size blanket, silverware, wine glasses, and plates, all with their own spots built into the basket. And if you carry the blanket separately, there is plenty of room for food for 2 and a half people.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Nothing too fancy, best for a small romantic picnic
customer_reviews.text: This basket is the cutest little thing for a picnic in the park. It is very small so it cannot fit too many food items, but you can definitely fit items for a meal for 2. As expected, the dinnerware and cutlery are not on the expensive side, but they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Ok value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This comes exactly as advertised but I would have hoped for slightly higher quality. Came with a slight odor that dissipated with unpacking and washing all for dishware. But for the price, I suppose it is adequate
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Missing Silverware
customer_reviews.text: Everything that came in the package looks great, however my basket was missing (2) forks, (2) knives, and (2) spoons. I'm hoping the manufacturer sees this and reaches out to me to address this issue. For now I'm giving it a 2, but would love to get replacement silverware and change this to a 5!
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Weber

customer_reviews.title: This was a gfit!
customer_reviews.text: We got this basket as a part of a wedding gift for one my oldest childhood friends. We added some bottles of wine and some personalized glasses to the basket to make it perfect for the Newlyweds. I thought the basket was very durable and looked very well made and put together. I would recommend this for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Romantic basket for two
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful basket for two. I purchased this basket to auction off for Breast Cancer month. It was a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee Liddell

customer_reviews.title: This would have been the perfect basket if there were no defects
customer_reviews.text: This would have been the perfect basket if there were no defects. It's a very cute and well made basket but the blue plaid backing on the lid was attached crooked causing the chain that connected the lid to the base to also be crooked. One of the glasses was broken at the stem but looked like it was than pushed back into the base of the glassware and wrapped in plastic. Disappointed by defects but other items are nicely made...
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: The picnic basket is SMALL.
customer_reviews.text: Well, the basket is small. I should have looked at the dimensions, I just looked at the picture. It is impossible to get food and a wine bottle in the basket.. The plates,napkins, and wineglasses are small. I do like the silverware. I am very disappointed, I did nit receive an adequate product for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a wedding gift. Before wrapping, I unpacked the plates and silverware and put everything in their places. It is beautiful and so well made. Absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ranae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as Christmas gifts for my two nieces that have recently gotten married. They loved them and can't wait for warmer weather to put them to use. The basket appears to be well made and so are the utensils. Perfect for two people.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Janke

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described; sturdy, good quality for the price. My grandson loved it and couldn't wait to pack a picnic lunch. We have 5 acres of flat land (with trees) for him to pick a place for us to have a picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Clara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife very thrilled in finding this on Amazon and very excited to have for this summer travels.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch DeCanter

customer_reviews.title: Picnic awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price and is an awesome quality picnic basket and also the contents. I bought two as gifts and will look forward to buying one for myself in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ilona

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Close
customer_reviews.text: Love the basket but it won’t close with the glasses and plates in it :( The plates push down on the cup and I cannot close it unless I take everything out. It’s very cute, I just wish it worked well too.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this for our anniversary to have a picnic. It's very cute, and made well. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Steel

customer_reviews.title: Decent at best
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for a wedding, great idea,, but quality was lacking. It seemed difficult to close when items were placed in spots. Could get by with tightening the straps a bit more. Gave 3 stars cause it could use improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful, sturdy picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful, sturdy picnic basket! I gave it as a wedding gift and the newlywed couple loved it! I'm always looking for new and different gift ideas as wedding gifts and this was it!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Taniguchi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice basket; quality plates
customer_reviews.text: Very nice basket; quality plates, etc. But no cheese board. I bought a cheese board to insert into basket, which I think will work fine. Also, the blanket doesn't come with a strap that you can carry outside the basket, so i'm not sure how much room will be left inside with it being rolled and taking up space, otherwise, it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Love it. The plates are a little bit smaller than what I envision but they are great. This is going to be used for a Diner en Blanc event
customer_reviews.author: Aida

customer_reviews.title: This was even better than I had hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: This was even better than I had hoped it would be. Excellent construction and really nice aesthetically as well. The blanket is also a nice add that you don't find in most picnic sets. I got it to give as a gift, and now I wish I had purchased one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Old Fashioned Romance!
customer_reviews.text: It is so cute! Just the right size for two people and roomy enough for packing a really nice meal. I was surprised how large the blanket is, and happy for the water proof backing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dodie

customer_reviews.title: it's almost perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cute, it's almost perfect for what I wanted. I only wish the handle was on the top and not the side, because it tilts everything if you use it. But it's still pretty great!
customer_reviews.author: Home skillet

customer_reviews.title: Great Basket
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice and good quality. Its just difficult to know how large it is when ordering so we were slightly disappointed with smallness.
customer_reviews.author: RodA

customer_reviews.title: Its questionable.
customer_reviews.text: Nice surprise... the plates and utensils weren't plastic but the wine glasses cant stand up un the basket and close the lid at the same time. Also, the wicker is not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: amb57

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this cute picnic basket for Christmas. I haven't had any problems with it at all. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alandra Sala

customer_reviews.title: This is an wonderful picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: This is an wonderful picnic basket. We used it last weekend on a motorcycle trip to the mountains. Had everything we need!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen K.

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and size. Great price. I bought this as a gift and after seeing it I plan to buy one for myself too!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Seevers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this picnic box! It bring everything you need for a romantic picnic with your love one.
customer_reviews.author: Michel A

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful and came with all pieces and in perfect condition. I can’t wait to take my love on a picnic now! Thank you... ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amber worthy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, great picnic set !
customer_reviews.text: Was a great way to spend a romantic picnic. The utensils are solid great pieces. Feels good and classic.
customer_reviews.author: TheBubz

customer_reviews.title: will make good use of the basket
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as expected, will make good use of the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome L. Mccormick

customer_reviews.title: There is a return fee for this item
customer_reviews.text: The basket was very small and didn’t fit my particular needs. There also were no handles. The seller also charges to return the material. Side note: this seller is also very aggressive about soliciting product reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a bridal shower gift. The bride loved it! Something different than the norm of lingerie.
customer_reviews.author: Girly

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, but arrived with pieces broken
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, but the cups were broken when the basket arrived. They were plastic, and the base was broken off of both. Nothing else was damaged, and everything remained wrapped in the basket. Unfortunate...
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Love this setup, plan to purchase another as a wedding gift soon.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Mosby

customer_reviews.title: Good picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: Over all basket is very well made. The plate were that comes with it is an added bonus. It does seem a little small but is manageable with planning the picnic with the room available
customer_reviews.author: tony parker

customer_reviews.title: So cute - excited to use it
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me the wicker basket set and I love it! we haven't used it yet, but it's so cute. As other people said it is small, if you are looking to carry lots of tupperware full of picnic food this may not work for you. There is room for a bottle of wine, a couple of sandwiches and fruit. Perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Angee Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This picnic basket is adorable, old-fashioned, and romantic! The quality is very good also. I was impressed by the blanket which is big enough to sit on comfortably. I'm so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AKB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful basket, it's had many trips to the beach already
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Lee

customer_reviews.title: Picnic baskets are back in style.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a bridal shower gift. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This basket is PERFECT!!! Equipped with everything needed for an awesome picnic. Beautiful colors, well put together. So happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha Durham

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love how convenient it is and the supplies contained inside.
customer_reviews.author: AddictedtoShopping

customer_reviews.title: Very cute for a simple picnic. Just be aware ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute for a simple picnic. Just be aware that you may have to bring something separate for food because this fits all the items exclusively, and nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: I've always wanted a cute picnic basket and this one ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a cute picnic basket and this one was exactly what I was looking for. It's delicate, so not something you would want to have to lug on a hike or anything but just the thing for an intimate get together for two!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's totally as i expected came with all you can see in the picture and the blanket
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Torregroza

customer_reviews.title: if this thing really retailed for $90 i'd be surprised ...
customer_reviews.text: if this thing really retailed for $90 i'd be surprised. all of it is very cheap-feeling and the fit inside the leather bits is only so-so
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm it's okay
customer_reviews.text: The people who are saying this is really high quality are full of poop. Pardon my French. But HQ means that i should show it to someone they be ask where did you get that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke completely off before we even got it to the car to go to our picnic! Incredibly disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Mann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The details, colors, accesories, looks very nice, the basket is solid and comes as appears on the picture Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Blackhawk

customer_reviews.title: Nice but broken.
customer_reviews.text: Liked it a lot but it arrived broken 😕. Wine glass and leather glass holder.
customer_reviews.author: CarlaM

customer_reviews.title: Von Shef Deluxe 2 person basket
customer_reviews.text: Basket was used at the Charlotte Steeplechase 22nd Annual Queen's Cup. As you can see it was an awesome presentation
customer_reviews.author: B. Cook

customer_reviews.title: I bought as a wedding present for my best friend. She absolutely loved it and can't wait ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a wedding present for my best friend. She absolutely loved it and can't wait to start using it. The only thing I was little disappointing in was that the "glasses", as cute as they are, are made plastic instead of glass. I'm sure it's more practical, but still seems a little cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jaeger

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a wedding present and it was beautiful! Great quality and what a fun idea/ date to give to a new couple who loves the outdoors! I want to order another for myself.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely :)
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It has everything you need. I can't wait to use it

customer_reviews.title: Best basket for the money !!!
customer_reviews.text: This basket is amazing , the quality is excellent !! Bought this as a surprise for my girlfriend and she absolutely loved it . Best Buy!

customer_reviews.title: Receiver loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend. Receiver loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Great basket
customer_reviews.text: Great basket but I meant to buy the bigger one for four.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this as a gift and the party loved it. I would recommend this seller. Great product to purchase.

customer_reviews.title: best part is the blanket has a slight rubberized bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: best part is the blanket has a slight rubberized bottom so new dew will soak through and annoying burrs/leaves wont get stuck in it. very nice product

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift came exactly as advertised super cute. love this basket

customer_reviews.title: It came quickly and was in . Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: It was just right for the gift exchange. Very nice for a couple to take off for the day

customer_reviews.text: Great basket, mostly just for carrying the plates and such but the gf loves it and prime saved my ass (just kidding I was ready).

customer_reviews.title: Great value for th me price
customer_reviews.text: The set is well put together, the quality is very nice with leather and brass handles and buckles. We used it today for a picnic And it worked great!

customer_reviews.text: Great craftsmanship! Perfect for outdoor concerts and weekend getaways. Just as pictured.

customer_reviews.title: Review in progress. 😄
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Got it fot her for a birthday present. Going to try it out more this weekend on an overnight road trip. We got it as an alternative to roadside food. Looks nice, comes with a bunch of stuff. Plates, flatware, etc. Wicker looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Val Shebeko

customer_reviews.title: Gave this as a birthday gift & she absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a birthday gift & she absolutely loved it!! Didn't actually see it personally as I had it shipped, but was told absolutely perfect. I went with the reviews & was glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: D. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Looks super cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Looks super cheap. Blanket doesn't match either. I was so excited to get it and it was such a let down. I thought it was going to be such a nice surprise for my boyfriend as we love to spend time together.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Smart, compact, go anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and I to use on our frequent long road trips as we love to picnic amongst the beauty rather than sit in stuffy restaurants. Also, we bike a lot and the basket straps conveniently onto a bike carrier for a rest stop and picnic. It's really perfect, great quality, all the utensils safely and attractively held in, and you can fit a nice bottle of wine in there if you feel so inclined! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product quality ☹️
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! The picnic basket is great but the blanket is damaged beyond reasonable use right out of the box! No excuses, I bought this new and was really looking forward to using it very soon. It will not protect underneath from dampness as promised! I would appreciate a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the design
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the design but it worked. I thought there would be a shoulder strap but I don't see one. I wish there was.
customer_reviews.author: 41reviews

customer_reviews.title: High quality basket
customer_reviews.text: Very well made basket with all the bells and whistles advertised. We are very happy
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Harvey

product_meta.title: VonShef Deluxe 2 Person Traditional Wicker Picnic Basket Hamper with Cutlery, Plates, Glasses, Tableware & Fleece Blanket
feature_bullets: Includes 2 x stainless steel knives, 2 x stainless steel forks, 2 x stainless steel spoons, 2 x dinner plates, 2 x plastic wine glasses and 2 x cotton napkins
Extra essentials also included - 2 x salt and pepper shakers, 1 x cheese knife, and bottle opener
Comes with patterned blanket with waterproof PEVA backing to protect against wet grass (measures approx. 45 x 52 inches)
Strong wicker construction with white and blue checked pattern cotton inner lining and PU leather carry handles
Size: L 15.7 x W 11 x D 7.9 inches approx.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars208 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
